global_notes: Baseline group assignments match the SPECIFICATION_SURFACE.json exactly. No reassignments made. G1 has two co-equal baselines (intent-to-share outcome and behavioral action outcome) each reported twice (once per focal treatment arm: survey2=Imposed, survey3=Voluntary). G2 has one baseline (intent to share fact-check, survey3=Voluntary vs Imposed). The rc/form/outcome/share_click2 spec in G1 is numerically identical to baseline__share_action_g1 because the surface lists share_click2 as both a co-baseline and an rc/form variant (treating want_share_fb as the canonical reference). Both are valid; the functional_form block in the rc/form row correctly identifies the semantic role. All 222 rows ran successfully; no failures.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: ATE of imposed and voluntary fact-checking interventions on intent/action to share alt-facts (fake news) on Facebook, among French survey participants in the main 3-arm experiment (survey < 4). Two co-equal baseline outcomes: (1) binary intent-to-share (want_share_fb), (2) behavioral sharing action (share_click2). Two focal treatment coefficients per regression: survey2=Imposed Fact-Check vs Alt-Facts control, survey3=Voluntary Fact-Check vs Alt-Facts control.
baseline_groups.expected_sign_notes: Both fact-checking interventions are expected to reduce intent/action to share alt-facts relative to the control arm.
baseline_groups.surface_notes: Surface lists baseline__intent_share_fb and baseline__share_action_g1 as co-equal baselines for G1. Both are replicated exactly. All four baseline rows have coefficient < 0, consistent with expected sign.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: ATE of voluntary vs imposed fact-checking on intent/action to share the fact-check itself on Facebook, restricted to the two fact-check arms (survey 2 and 3). Primary outcome: want_share_facts. Focal coefficient: survey3 (Voluntary vs Imposed).
baseline_groups.expected_sign_notes: Imposed fact-check is expected to increase sharing of the fact-check relative to voluntary (or equivalently, voluntary reduces sharing vs imposed), but sign is uncertain a priori. Baseline coefficient is negative (-0.028).
baseline_groups.surface_notes: Surface lists baseline__factcheck_action as the sole G2 baseline. Replicated exactly. The p-value of 0.076 is marginally significant (not at 5% threshold); sign is negative (voluntary < imposed on fact-check sharing).
